description: bw show <id> renders the wrong issue ID in the BLOCKED BY section. For bw-u24.1, the JSON (--json) correctly shows blocked_by: ["bw-u24.5"], but the human-readable display shows "BLOCKED BY → ○ bw-u24.2" — a completely different issue. This is the most dangerous of the three because it gives confidently wrong information and can send someone chasing problems that don't exist (e.g., a circular dependency that wasn't real).
title: bw show displays wrong blocker in human-readable output
